title: CreativeLIVE - Fundamentals of Digital Photography 2014 with Joh
description:
Fundamentals of Digital Photography 2014 with John Greengo

Make 2014 the year you reach your full potential as a photographer! Join creativeLIVE and John Greengo for a five-day exploration of the fundamentals of digital photography.

John will cover everything you need to know to meet your photography goals. You'll learn how to choose the gear that's best for you, and how to use it to its fullest potential. From shutter speeds to apertures to depth-of-field and much, much more, you'll build an understanding of the core concepts every successful photographer needs to know. You'll also learn about the streamlining and workflow management techniques that separate the amateur photographers from the pros. You'll explore ways to look at and think critically about your own images, so that you can analyze what's working and target areas for growth.

Whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve just purchased your first digital camera or are a seasoned photographer ready for a refresher course, this workshop will give you the skills and inspiration to take your work to new heights.
